1.content: Analyze workspace structure and inventory all files
1.details:
1. List complete workspace directory structure
2. Identify all files and subdirectories
3. Catalog key project components and documentation
4. Ensure no critical files are missing

2.details:
1. Document the overall project development phases (1-10)
2. Create comprehensive execution timeline
3. Detail key deliverables and milestones achieved
4. Include technology stack decisions and architecture choices
5. Document compliance and security implementations

3.content: Create detailed sub-plans for each major component
3.details:
1. Backend development plan (FastAPI, AI agents, RAG system)
2. Frontend development plan (React, TypeScript, UI components)
3. Database and infrastructure plan (PostgreSQL, Redis, migrations)
4. AI/ML implementation plan (LangChain, models, vector store)
5. Security and compliance plan (HIPAA, authentication, encryption)
6. Deployment and DevOps plan (Docker, Kubernetes, multi-cloud)
7. Documentation and quality assurance plan

4.content: Create comprehensive zip archive for GitHub upload
4.details:
1. Include all workspace files and subdirectories
2. Add execution plans and documentation
3. Include README.md and CLAUDE.md briefing documents
4. Ensure proper file structure for GitHub repository
5. Verify archive completeness and integrity
6. Generate final downloadable archive
